modName: Pretty woodelf follower Liliath plus variants
summary:
A pretty bosmer and 6 other pretty companions
*Update Fixed warpaint issues and added  4 new followers
descriptionHtml:
**Update
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve been able to work on this but I finally fixed  the warpaint issues.  Also added 3 new followers, Aleksandra an Imperial, Nihm a High elf based off Liliath, Orara an Orc.  Lastly I added Judith(who is basically Lily painted up like a demon) and Bryna(who has the same face/voice as my Brelyna Maryon).  Aleksandra and Orara require Newermind\'s Hair Pack which can be found here  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809 

Original files warpaint issues have been fixed, liliath is now packaged with her hair and Brelyna\'s esp no longer effects Mjoll 

Bryna, Judith and Nihm can be found in The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun
Liliath, Lily, Aleksandra and Orara can be found in the Bannered Mare, also in Whiterun.

Lily, Nihm, Bryna and Judith have the same spells, perks and combat style as Aranea Ienith since she\'s arguably the best vanilla follower(she can be somewhat overpowered at earlier levels however).  Liliath and Aleksandra have 1handed combat styles similar to Vorstagg while Orara prefers 2handed weapons. They all level with you and are compatible for marriage.  This mod comes with the SKS hair mesh textured by BloodySunday since there isn\'t a standalone for it yet.  

I strongly recommend checking out BloodySunday\'s hair textures, if there\'s a hair mesh out there he probably has a number of great textures for it.

Kuma Kuma Kokuma Hair and Bagserk Hair Retexture by Bloodysunday (links to meshes)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6720

I used Superb ENB-RL by Superl3-sung9533 with DOF turned off and  DYNAVISION by Gopher and MyGoodEye to get the screenshots to look the way they do, it\'s a little graphics intensive and I couldn\'t really play the game with them on my little laptop but they make for stunning pictures.

Superb ENB-RL by Superl3-sung9533
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11318

DYNAVISION - Dynamic Depth of Field by Gopher and MyGoodEye
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12525

If you want to make Judith more demon-like these mods have some nifty accessories (and really revealing armors)

Dark Lilith Sexy Succubus Armor CBBE NKT by Nikitaa
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13067

R18Pn 05 - Astaroth Suit for UNP and CBBE V3 by NPR
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14221

Other mods used in the screenshots:

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

CBBE skin texture by navetsea
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

Coverwomen by mrLenski (look 2)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563

Covereyes by mrLenski (eyes 1)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869

Natural Eyes by nevenbridge (for Lily\'s human eyes)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3589

Somewhat Skimpy DragonScale Armour with CBBEv2 version by Ketwaroo D Yaasir
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5411

Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set -Work In Progress- by Killer Keo
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654

Dark Lilith Sexy Succubus Armor CBBE NKT by Nikitaa
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13067

Luba SkyWings by Matthieu Pinsonneault
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11621

FavoredSouls Evening Star by FavoredSoul
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10984

Warglaives and Silverlight Armor 099 CBBE by jojjo and Frozzled
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10251

Field Mage Outfit CBBEv3 Echo by Echo 1162
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14198

Ancient Nord Armor and Saviors Hide CBBEv3 Echo by echo 1162
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10790

Credits:
Thanks to BloodySunday for his great hair textures
Thanks to Bethesda for an awesome game
Thanks to the nexus for having a community that fosters mod creation and sharing
Thanks to SK_KKK for his hair mesh (his credits below)
